mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT c.* FROM category c WHERE c.type = #{type} AND ( c.is_system = 1 -- 系统内置 OR c.created_by = #{userId} -- 用户自定义 ) ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category (name, type, created_by, visibility, is_system, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{type}, #{createdBy}, #{visibility}, #{isSystem}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE category SET name = #{name}, created_by = #{createdBy}, visibility = #{visibility}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND is_system = 0 -- 只允许修改自定义分类
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM category WHERE id = #{id} AND is_system = 0
